meanings.definition: relating to or situated on the edge or periphery
meanings.sent1: The peripheral areas of the city are less crowded.
meanings.sent2: The house had a beautiful garden at its peripheral boundary.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a peripheral spot on the tree to hide its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her peripheral vision caught a glimpse of movement in the bushes.
meanings.sent5: The peripheral details of the painting added depth to the artwork.

meanings.definition: an auxiliary device connected to a computer
meanings.sent1: I need to buy a new peripheral for my computer.
meanings.sent2: The printer is an essential peripheral for the office.
meanings.sent3: The mouse and keyboard are peripheral devices for the computer.
meanings.sent4: She plugged in the peripheral to transfer the files.
meanings.sent5: The technician fixed the issue with the peripheral quickly.

meanings.definition: a device that is used to input or output data from a computer
meanings.sent1: The peripheral allows you to interact with the computer.
meanings.sent2: Make sure all peripherals are properly connected before starting.
meanings.sent3: The student forgot to bring their peripheral for the presentation.
meanings.sent4: The peripheral malfunctioned during the important meeting.
meanings.sent5: He upgraded his peripheral to improve his gaming experience.
